segments.text: I need to get to PCC , but I don't know which bus to catch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where exactly are you coming from ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm coming from Fair Oaks and Las Flores Drive in Altadena .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a problem walking a little bit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you walk down Fair Oaks to Altadena Drive , you can catch the 267 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Tell me which direction it should be going .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Make sure to catch it going west .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You get off on Del Mar and Hill .
segments.speaker: S2
